reviewText: Honestly...Its a great booster when it comes to introductory to the business....However, a lot of the information is OUT DATED. Need a new one on the current trends in show business.
An education for the actor who wants to learn the business of working professionally in tv and film.  Before you audition or meet an agent/business manager, invest some time and money in this movie.
Very insightful into the craft of acting! Great for actors in the craft looking to lean more about film and television acting.
